HERO_CONTENT: I am a passionate software developer with over 10 years of experience in building and maintaining high-quality web and mobile applications. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work with leading technology companies and startups, where I honed my expertise in full-stack development, team collaboration, and delivering scalable, secure solutions. With a strong foundation in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and cloud-based technologies, I have successfully led development teams, contributed to open-source projects, and delivered cutting-edge products that meet both user needs and business goals.

EXPERIENCES.description: Overseeing the development of large-scale web applications, leading a team of developers, and ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend services. Spearheaded the migration of legacy systems to a modern cloud infrastructure.

Developed complex web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver robust, scalable solutions. Mentored junior developers and contributed to improving development processes.

Worked on the development of interactive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Improved website performance and enhanced user experience. Played a key role in implementing responsive design across multiple platforms.

FORMATION.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
FORMATION.description: Focused on software development, algorithms, and data structures. Gained a strong foundation in computer science principles and hands-on experience in building software applications.

FORMATION.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering
FORMATION.description: Advanced studies in software engineering, emphasizing system design, cloud computing, and scalable architectures. Developed expertise in building robust and efficient systems.

FORMATION.degree: Professional Certificate in Full Stack Development
FORMATION.description: Comprehensive training in full stack development, covering frontend and backend technologies, including JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases.
Completed AWS certification focusing on cloud computing fundamentals, cloud architecture, and security best practices.
